title: Uhm..Hello Riot paying customer here??!
body: Hi Riot, been having a problem with not being able to load into games after character select. Its all on your end and all the posts I've found on it have no answers or help from you as far as a know. Any support would be great, I tried to submit a ticket but your support service is hands down the most complex thing ever created considering I log in but get signed out straight away! I do not wish to have a leaver penalty on my account for something thats completely out of my control. Get back to me please. Thanks - Paying customer

replies.body:
Hey Yougondienow,

I'm sorry to hear that you're encountering connection issues to the League of Legends servers. Before we start looking at factors that may be causing these issues on the ISP end, I'd first like to confirm that the issue does not lay on your end of things. Can you try as many solutions as you can that are provided in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article?

If those solutions don't work, let's start looking into the diagnostics and see where the issue may be originating. To do this, we'll need you to provide some information for us: 

1. Confirmation that you've tried the solutions in the Troubleshooting Connection Issues article
2. ISP that you're using
3. Region and/or State
4. Trace Route (Tracert) - If you're unsure how to do this, check out [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)
5. When did these issues begin occurring, and how often?
6. Additional information you'd like to provide

Thank you for your time.

Hey thanks for getting back to me so soon. I've had the problem since the 14th 03/16. Worked fine the night before then just wouldnt load into game after character select the next night. I;'ve had the same problem in the past, i just stopped playing for a few months (after repairing, uninstalling/reinstalling, re-repairing, rinsing and repeating), came back, patched, and it seemed to work fine again. My firewall has never caused issues. DNS has been configured to the 8.8.8.8 / 8.8.4.4 and cleared etc. No packet loss. Ports are good. Im with Vodafone NZ. I've just run Tracert, but becuase this isn't a ticket what should i do with it? Thanks again for your time
You can either copy and paste your tracert here or upload the file to http://upload.wrenchmen.org/ and link the file here.

Okay here it is:


Tracing route to 103.240.227.5 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1    <1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  VODAFONE [192.168.1.1] 
  2    22 ms    22 ms    23 ms  118-92-191-254.dsl.dyn.ihug.co.nz [118.92.191.254] 
  3    25 ms    24 ms    23 ms  bvi-400.bgnzwtc02.wlg.vf.net.nz [203.109.180.210] 
  4    24 ms    24 ms    24 ms  bvi-188.bgnzwtc02.wlg.vf.net.nz [203.109.180.209] 
  5    56 ms    57 ms    57 ms  10.123.80.58 
  6    57 ms    56 ms    90 ms  as6507.nsw.ix.asn.au [218.100.52.50] 
  7     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  8     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  9     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 10     *        *
If anyone can hack me using this can you make this discussion private plz <3

Hey Yougondienow,

Nothing seems to stand out in the Tracert, so I'm going to recommend using the [**Hextech Toolkit**](http://rito.pl/z/hextech). Can you download and run the HTK and let me know if that resolves your issues?

Otherwise, please send the logs that the HTK collects to 
>**oce-wrenchmen@googlegroups.com**

Thanks!

Thanks doing that now, hopefully it works! I've tried joining games as I've been troubleshooting but i didnt get to load into them - can I please not be penalised for these? I really appreciate your time and effort Mr Wuks, thanks kindly
Unfortunately LeaverBuster punishments can't be reversed, so it's best to test your connection with Custom Matches before joining matchmade games.
Zzz :c  my own fault. Will rematch now wish me luck. Sorry I'm not really used to doing all this so thank you for bearing with me!
Okay guess Ill just do nothing, receive no more help and not play anymore. Thanks anyway
Okay still nothing. Should I use repatch? I'll email log now anywho
Try repatching and see if that works.
Nah still nothing. Ill send that log too

Hey I'm still encountering the problem. I looked at my emails, turns out:

We're writing to let you know that the group you tried to contact (oce-wrenchmen) may not exist, or you may not have permission to post messages to the group. A few more details on why you weren't able to post:

 * You might have spelled or formatted the group name incorrectly.
 * The owner of the group may have removed this group.
 * You may need to join the group before receiving permission to post.
 * This group may not be open to posting.

If you have questions related to this or any other Google Group, visit the Help Center at https://groups.google.com/support/.

Thanks,

Google Groups

I'm just gonna give league a miss for a few months I guess. Cheers anyway
Hey will i just get an email back or should i check back here from time to time Wuks?
